ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: This is actaully what I see... 1)People walking/fighting around and only people fighting/walking around.. 2)Guage
ygData.messageBody:
This is actaully what I see...

1)People walking/fighting around and only people fighting/walking around..<Everyone is using /tell /group messaging>

2)Guage says out of character </ooc, something like broadcasting so everyone can "hear"> "Am I able to start a whorehouse?" BlahBlahBlah says out of character "Oh shutup before I call a GM" And on and on, people are /ooc their opinions and you get flooded <grins>

3)Doh! Dwarf has Handphone? Issit the lastest CDMA version? <Grins>

4)MrBarbarian ruffles MrDwarf's hair. This is a fact but the Dwarf took it in his stride. He was really comical actaully. Running around a bunch of Barbarians dodging past them. He was good fun to his hunting party.
----- Original Message -----
From: Entreri
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 10:12 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Re: (no subject)


Not at all,hehe..I rather like all the information thats been pumping up for the past few days :) Though I would like to know if there are players here that actually ROLE-PLAY their characters meaning

1.I would never see a DarkElf cleric curing an elf :)
2.An orge getting killed for a damsel in distress
3.Some dwarf that said someone called him on his mobile phone

I would love to see ppl doing that :)
